body_html:
BrumbleXu, 's solution worked for me!
Many thanks, I think that the issue is with addressing the directory in Windows.
Just log in to your directory (one dir before your tensorboard dir) and address that directory.
and use: http://localhost:6006/ in Explorer/Chrome.

body:
**BrumbleXu**, 's solution worked for me!
Many thanks, I think that the issue is with addressing the directory in Windows.
Just log in to your directory (one dir before your tensorboard dir) and address that directory.
and use: **http://localhost:6006/** in Explorer/Chrome.
